inclusion.criterion: Patients who are used to use an inhalation chamber with a face mask
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have not had asthmatic decompensation for at least 1 month.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients' parents having given their written consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With normal clinical respiratory examination on the day of the test.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose parents are unable to understand the purpose and conditions of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose parents are unable to give their consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with a nasopharyngeal infection in the previous month
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Child with nasal obstruction, nocturnal snoring, adenoid facies or facial malformation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient presenting with an asthmatic decompensation episode in the previous month
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
